original_text: Which was the son of Jose, which was the son of Eliezer, which was the son of Jorim, which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi,
korean_text: 그 위는 예수요 그 위는 엘리에서요 그 위는 요림이요 그 위는 맛닷이요 그 위는 레위요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Jose
which was the son of Eliezer
which was the son of Jorim
which was the son of Matthat
which was the son of Levi
